name: GrampaWisdom
0:
”Alexa open Grampa Wisdom”
”What does grampa have to say”
”Help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: grampa wisdom
des:
Grampa Wisdom is a humorous glimpse into some of the sayings and quotes as remembered by the developer of this skill, a Grampa himself. Those recollections are not always the sayings with which you may be familiar, but they are meant to be fun. 

To hear these words of wisdom, just ask, “What would Grampa say?” Then you’ll hear 3 random pearls of wisdom spoken by Grampa.

Enjoy!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
